channel.title: ScreenShots
channel.description:
Well i have a server and every time i take a screenshot i paste it in paint shop pro to crop it but when i go to upload it using photobucket it says image has not valid extension uses are smf,jpeg,jpg and so on i wanna know where i can upload them i've tried imageshack but i just don't get where you upload and i think i might have to pay to upload with imageshack,
If anyone has information for me or what i can do please post it. ;D
(P.S.)I know i mighten have to pay for imageshack but can someone atleast tell me step by step instructions please! ;D ;) :)

item.title: ScreenShots
item.dc:creator: @Tramposch Tramposch
item.description:
@Tramposch wrote:

imageshack is free
For screenshots, you take the screenshot, crop and everhting
when you go to save as, as file extension, save it as a PNG for best quality, it is not working because the extension youa re using is a specific extension for psp (painshop pro)

Read full topic

item.title: ScreenShots
item.dc:creator: @kupo kupo
item.description:
@kupo wrote:

when you save it photoshop use .psd just save it as a different file type in the box right below it or after the name of it.

Read full topic
